subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{zh-div|水}} ancient name of {{w|Han River (Hubei)|Han river}}, a tributary of the {{w|Yangtze}} river
# {{zh-div|州}} {{lb|zh|historical}} name of [[prefecture]] in [[Hubei]] province during {{w|Western Wei}}, {{w|Sui dynasty|Sui}} and {{w|Tang dynasty|Tang}} dynasties
# {{zh-div|州}} {{lb|zh|historical}} name of [[prefecture]] in [[Shaanxi]] province during {{w|Song_dynasty#Southern_Song,_1127–1279|Southern Song}} period (1127-1279)
# {{lb|zh|archaic}} [[inundation]] of [[water]]
